entry.title: Stainless Steel Wall Mount Hand Sink with 4" Faucet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Champs Restaurant Supply
Type: Hand Sinks
Price: 120.00

This 16" economy hand sink with 4" splash mounted gooseneck faucet provides an affordable priced hand washing station for any commercial kitchen. It features a single deep drawn 10" x 14" x 5" sink bowl. A 1-1/2" stainless steel basket drain with strainer plate and faucet is included with the sink.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Winco
Type: Countertop Food Warmers

Winco FW-S500 Electric Food Warmer - 1200W
  • Electric Food Warmer is an energy efficient way to keep your food warm and ready to plate
  • It's specially designed internal heating elements
  • this countertop warmer holds your prepared foods at foodsafe temperatures for hours
  • It also has a heavy duty water well made of durable 20 gauge
  • 18/8 stainless steel to stand up to the daily demands of your business
  • Winco FW-S500 Electric Food Warmer has a holding capacity of 6 gallon and will hold up to 1 full size steam table pan
  •  NSF certified and ETF listed

entry.title: Atosa ATFS-75 75 LB Stainless Steel Gas Deep Fryer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Atosa Refrigeration
Type: Fryers
Price: 1511.00

Dimension: 21-1/4" Wide x 30" Deep x 44-1/2" Height
Burner Style: Tube Burners
Construction: Stainless Steel
Capacity: 75 Lb 
# of Fry Baskets: 2 Baskets (included)
Temperature Range: 200 -400 F Degrees 
Total BTU: 34,000 Per Burner/ 170,000 Total 
Warranty: 1 Year Parts and Labor and Prorated 5 Years Fryer Pot Warranty

 

Atosa heavy duty 75 LB deep fryer has all stainless steel construction, a 75 lb oil capacity, and 5 burners rated at 170,000 BTU's for quick heat recovery! All stainless steel construction provides added durability and easy maintenance for your kitchen crew. Safety features includes self-reset high temperature limit and oil cooling zone seated in the bottom of the tank. All fryers come with worry free 1 year parts and labor warranty and conform with NSF and ETL Sanitation standards.
  • (5) 34,000 BTU Burners
  • Durable Stainless Steel Construction
  • Corrosion-Resistant and easy to clean
  • Heavy Duty Burners with Standby Pilots
  • Safety Valve with Automatic Voltage Stabilization
  • High Quality Thermostat with Temp Control 200-400 Degrees
  • Self-Reset Hi-Limit Shut Off for Added Safety
  • Nickel Plated Baskets with Wire Mesh Crumb Screen
  • Oil Cooling Zone for Food Residue
  • Adjustable Stainless Steel Legs
